isvte:package:subscribers.description: Retreive all subscribers for a given Package or PackageVersion

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields from PackageSubscriber you wish to return.

where.name: where
where.description: The SOQL where clause applied to limit the results.

orderby.name: orderby
orderby.description: Order the results, supply a comma separated list of field names.  Can optionally include DESC modifier to sort in descending order.
orderby.default: OrgType DESC, InstanceName, MetadataPackageId, MetadataPackageVersionId, OrgName

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Specify the maximum number of rows to return.

isvte:util:split.description: Split the records in one file into multiple output files based on a property.  A new file will be created using the property value as a suffix to the original filename.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

input.name: input
input.description: The file that contains the full set of records.

property.name: property
property.description: The property used to split the output.

outputdirectory.name: outputdirectory
outputdirectory.description: The directory to create the output files in.

isvte:util:subtract.description: Subtract the records in one file from the other. input a contains all records, input b contains all records to remove.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

inputa.name: inputa
inputa.description: Input A: File that contains the full set of records.

inputb.name: inputb
inputb.description: Input B: File that contains the set of records to remove from input a.

isvte:package:pushrequest:create.description: Create PackagePushRequest and associated PackagePushJob records.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packageversionid.name: packageversionid
packageversionid.description: PackageVersionID to upgrade the subscriber to.

scheduledstarttime.name: scheduledstarttime
scheduledstarttime.description: The date and time (UTC) at which the push request is processed, in ISO 8601 format. Set this value to the earliest time that you want Salesforce to attempt to start the push. As a best practice, schedule pushes at off-peak hours like 1:00 AM Saturday. If you don’t specify a value, the push starts when the package push request’s Status is set to Pending.

subscriberids.name: subscriberids
subscriberids.description: Comma separated list of subscriber org ids, to create associated PackagePushJobs for.

subscribersfile.name: subscribersfile
subscribersfile.description: Path to JSON file of subscriber org ids, to create associated PackagePushJobs for.  Expects array of objects such as {OrgKey: 'XXXXXXXXXXXXX'}

preview.name: preview
preview.description: Path to JSON file of subscriber org ids, to create associated PackagePushJobs for.  Expects array of objects such as {OrgKey: 'XXXXXXXXXXXXX'}

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields from PackagePushRequest you wish to return.

where.name: where
where.description: The SOQL where clause applied to limit the results.

orderby.name: orderby
orderby.description: Order the results, supply a comma separated list of field names.  Can optionally include DESC modifier to sort in descending order.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Specify the maximum number of rows to return.

includejobs.name: includejobs
includejobs.description: Retrieve the child PackagePushJob records linked to the requested PackagePushRequests.

isvte:package:pushrequest:update.description: Pushes a package upgrade to a specified org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

id.name: id
id.description: PackagePushRequestId to update.  Cannot be used in conjunction with --allcreated, or --allpending flags.

where.name: where
where.description: Alternative to providing PackagePushRequestId, updates all records that match the provided where clause.  Recommend using with --preview option to review impact before executing.

status.name: status
status.description: The status you want to set for the specified PackagePushRequest records.

preview.name: preview
preview.description: Preview the update request (JSON) without making the API call.

isvte:trust:instance:list.description: Retreive all subscribers for a given Package or PackageVersion

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

childproducts.name: childproducts
childproducts.description: Include nested products. products must be set.
